script.caption: A shell-less Timmy the turtle looks out at the night sky, Mars shining brightly in the cosmos.

dialogue.text: That's where I need to go... Mars. Maybe the Mars materials can help me create a new shell.
Mars, the red planet? But Timmy, that's quite an adventure!

script.caption: Timmy and Skye stand in a makeshift observatory, space blueprints spread out over a wooden table.

dialogue.text: We'll need a spaceship, Timmy. Remember, Mars is a long way off.
I guess we better get building then, right Skye?

script.caption: Timmy and Skye work tirelessly on a tiny spaceship, using all sorts of mechanics and gadgets.

dialogue.text: Pass me the Vega wrench, Timmy. We need to secure these thrusters.
On it, Skye. We're one step closer to Mars.

script.caption: The spaceship, made of metal and love, stands proudly against the sun, ready for its journey to Mars.

dialogue.text: It's time for a turtle to fly, right Skye?
Right Timmy, we're ready for a shell of an adventure!
